mapper.select: select rank() over(order by addr_idx desc) as no , addr_idx , mem_idx , zipcode , addr_street , addr_detail from moviedb.address where mem_idx=#{ mem_idx };
mapper.insert: insert into address ( zipcode, addr_street, addr_detail) values ( #{ zipcode }, #{ addr_street }, #{ addr_detail })
mapper.delete: delete from address where addr_idx =#{ addr_idx }
